import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function AddProductForm() { const [category, setCategory] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [imageUrl, setImageUrl] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [calories, setCalories] = useState(""); const [type, setType] = useState(""); return (
); }
